name: Baksonvest
overview:
Baksonvest UK ltd. is a private investment firm with a distinctive philosophy and approach. Our offices are located in London. Baksonvest UK ltd. is looking to make long-term strategic investments. Our objective is to identify companies with product-oriented businesses, solid underlying financials and strong positions in a Western European consumer-oriented market.

A professional consultancy and investment firm specialising in helping small firms to grow bigger by raising funds, developing strategy and professional Business development and Marketing

Our core team consists of 2 serial entrepreneurs and dedicated professionals who are responsible for evaluating investments. Our team will take an active role in the management of selected targets. Our financial backers are composed of several established funds and a number of high net worth individuals. We sometimes work with angel networks when it regards smaller size deals and where angels add value to the business.
